long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Detects microaggressions and aggressions in sent posts and messages on social media and warns you through popups and changing of text color that you can toggle on and off via settings.

Quality of life settings include dark mode.
